commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=2}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.mask 0
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=3..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.mask

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=1}] run tag @s add energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run tag @s remove energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand=3}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=1}] run tag @s add hand.uni.beam
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=2..}] run tag @s remove hand.uni.beam
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.or.energy.beam=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.or.energy.beam
execute as @s run scoreboard players add @s SatsuIronManArmorSkillPoint.see 1
execute as @s[scores={SatsuIronManArmorSkillPoint.see=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s SatsuIronManArmorSkillPoint.see

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.flight.set
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=6..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=9..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.failsafe.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.failsafe.set
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.set
execute as @s[scores={satsu.prev.iron.man.armor=0..13}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.prev.iron.man.armor 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=0..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.prev.iron.man.armor 1
execute at @s as @e run effect give @e[tag=!superior.shockwave,distance=..5] minecraft:slowness 1 255 true
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.speed=0..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=6..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.speed=3..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=9..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.arms.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.arms.set

first_tick_commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 0

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams=0..1}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams=1..3}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.break=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.break
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.break matches 0.. run title @s actionbar {"translate":"satsu.iron.man.addon.break.off","color":"blue"}}
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand 1
execute as @s run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded
execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded 1
execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded.max.energy 1
execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded.max.energy 2

last_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.unlocking.set.block=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.addon.unlocking.set.block

commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded 2
